name: Diane FLORIAN, Appellant v. SOUTHWESTERN VETERANS CENTER; Department of Military and Veterans Affairs; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and District 13, District Council 84, American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, AFL-CIO, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2017, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
